html:
3.16.25  11:01 pm   Is writing HTML as a hobby a modern-day analogue to doing calligraphy as a hobby?

      not quite. i'd say a modern-day analogue of doing calligraphy would be writing with a pencil on paper

3.16.25  9:54 pm   will people ever be as smart as you?

      yep, in fact they have surpassed me. other people are smarter than me now

3.16.25  9:32 pm   could you tell me the first letter of the first word in one of the videos youre working on

      sure. the first letter in one of the videos is s. i hope that helps

3.16.25  8:25 pm   how do you come up with ideas when you sit down to make music or videos or other such things?

      ideas have to decide when to come to me. but if they like the way i treat them then i guess they'll be motivated to come more often. and then i can beg and plead but that only works half the time. the other half of the time they can surprise me at a time that is more comfortable for them

3.16.25  7:26 pm   What's your favorite type of bird??

      bird of flight

3.16.25  7:10 pm   is the "i'm gonna be sick" in i like to wear soft clothing part of the script or a mistake that you just left in

      exactly as written

3.16.25  6:14 pm   How do you describe what you do for a living?

      maybe create a diversion

3.16.25  6:12 pm   did u get inspiration from minecraft when u wrote hi i'm steve

      no, i had no exposure to minecraft at that time

3.16.25  6:07 pm   i think breaks and downtime are important for my creative process, but i often spend those moments 'doomscrolling' social media. i feel bad after i do that for some reason.

     in that case i'd argue don't do that

     do you take breaks? what do you like to do during breaks?

     language learning, for sure

     do you ever feel guilty for wasting time?

     sometimes i feel guilty for wasting too much time language learning. but, at the same time, sometimes i get scared that i'll never have enough time to learn as much language as i want to

3.16.25  6:04 pm   could you tell me some songs with uncommon/interesting/idk-what-adjective-to-use chord progressions and catchy melodies? i was listening to living for the city by stevie wonder and i thought wow the "da da da" part really gets stuck in my head and i have not rly heard chords like that anywhere else

      that's because stevie wonder is crazy. your best bet here is to just keep listening to stevie wonder and see if he does anything else crazy. however, i cannot predict which things and which parts will connect to you. absolutely no one can predict that. but stevie wonder is from a very special planet and again my only suggestion here is that you may find something else there somewhere

3.16.25  5:19 pm   how do you deal with friends asking what youre up to... do you show them what youre doing or do you keep it secret until everyone can see it or what

      if you're working on a long-term project then i'd say it's usually a curse to show it before it's complete. that's just my feeling

3.16.25  4:20 pm   When you're in the situation where people say "so... what do you do for work" what do you say? Or are you just not ever in that situation.

      i don't consider that a polite question. so, i'm usually forced to enter into a deep discussion about whether or not that's a polite question. i know, that seems pretty heavy for casual chit chat, because the vast majority of people probably think it is a normal question so it may be a slightly contentious discussion, but in this situation i would probably have no choice. actually on second thought here's what i would do: i would make them answer it first, and tell me what their job is. and that would buy me some time to spontaneously ask them about something totally different

3.16.25  4:11 pm   If it was possible, would you like to be able to read people's minds, know what they're thinking? For me, I think it would be too much. I have a hard enough time processing my own thoughts and feelings.

      it sounds traumatic but i'll admit it's also hard to not want that

3.16.25  11:27 am   Jesus presenting the world: "like and ascribe, thanks"

      if jesus is anything like he says he is, he'd get straight to the mother fucking content

3.16.25  5:23 am   3.15.25  3:10 pm yeah i felt at least one a minute after asking that. allow me to backpedal a bit. what loopholes do you sense in "math is the discipline of making sense"

      i thought that would be called "logic." "logic is the discipline of making sense". and maybe a side effect of math is that it's automatically logical. math has no goal to be logical, but by default it is. it can't help it

3.16.25  5:02 am   If God exists, do you believe God is fallible?

      what if mistakes are fun. what if mistakes represent the greatest oportunity for life, to live and learn things

3.16.25  3:41 am   A few years ago I got the opportunity for a job on the other side of the country and decided to take only the belongings that I could take on the train and try out something different for some indeterminate amount of time. I've been living very minimally and am learning about and working on some very specific things at an insane rate. Never would have thought I would be where I am. But... I've not been creating or performing music with myself or other people. The new thing has taken over the obsessive and creative energy part of me. The extent of the physical practicing I do is playing with drum sticks on the floor sometimes (but like maybe a few times a month). This would sound insane to the me from a few years ago. Maybe I care about the new thing more? I'm not sure. It's very technicalresearchy work, and I work on well defined problems and explain them with precise language and equations as well as more ill defined engineering problems with pragmatism. I care deeply about these things (mainly a sort of NEEDING to find some truth or answer), but they never seem to invoke feelingsthat truly match my experience of music. The only times I get that feelingof awe and verge of tears thing is when listening to a song. Usually it quickly fades though and the mind is back racing around trying to work on my research. Do you relate to any of these kinds of things? I don't know if this phase is one part of making my future creations better or if I'm in a trap. To be clear, I view the things I'm working on now as an example of those creations, but they feel less real somehow. I'm making the assumption that there are some similarities to working in "all the departments" for your productions or getting really nerdy about whatever you do.

      music is a magical power but, as i always say, it's usually only part of the picture. so you're really making the world go round by developing your non-music side here

3.16.25  2:32 am   Is the moon a nice vacation spot?

      it seems like it could be. with sufficient facilities and amenities

3.16.25  2:18 am   do you get annoyed when people ask confusing questions or do you not get confused? 

      the confusing part is some of the most standard popular questions actually seem more confusing the more times you hear them. but on the other hand that's exactly what i signed up for. i mean what a majestic challenge

3.16.25  1:37 am   were you always a musical prodigy or did you do some serious musical grinding early in life?

      music came extremely naturally extremely early. i was a freak, which certainly was a strain on my ability to connect with peers. which in turn makes me need to drive for success instead, to fill that void. never really recovered from this

3.16.25  1:27 am   is there more behind the door?

      which door? nevermind, yes

3.16.25  1:25 am   How often do you gravitate towards the earth?

      all the time

3.16.25  12:35 am   i feel very pentaceratops right now. do you understand the feeling?

      no

3.15.25  11:00 pm   when did you invent music?

      still working on it

3.15.25  10:54 pm   what even is god? (or goddess (or gods (or goddesses)))

      those are words, for sure

3.15.25  10:28 pm   what is your favorite animal?

      person

3.15.25  10:17 pm   is cheese moon flavored or is the moon cheese flavored

      it looks like cheese in cartoons. that's what i think is going on here

3.15.25  9:14 pm   Is the Universe round?

      it seems like it would be

3.15.25  9:04 pm   hi bill, i'm a senior in high school and i can't help but feel like i haven't done enough in my four years here, and i'm feeling a bit empty, especially compared to a lot of people i know. do you have any suggestions on how to cope with that sort of feeling? do you get an infusion of youthful vigor at the start of college? how do you deal with leaving a place that means a lot to you, especially if you don't think you did enough to give back?

      what i think i'm hearing is that everything is going fine

3.15.25  8:53 pm   can you effortlessly twirl your drumsticks in the middle of playing on command

      i don't know what playing on command is, but i am comfortable twirling drumsticks. pencils also

3.15.25  7:03 pm   Do you believe humans are innately selfish or innately benevolent, generally speaking?

     how about innately both, or would that break the game

     Do our laws and social norms suppress or reflect basic human nature?

     no matter what you'd mean by that, i can't imagine the answer not being both

     Perhaps music and art is the closest we'll ever see of our raw selves...

     i think you see it a lot also in..... situations

3.15.25  6:06 pm   what is it like when you don't meet your deadlines 

      their value is weakened. so the next deadline is gonna be weaker, less likely to be observed

3.15.25  4:14 pm   Is bias just unconscious ideology?

      no it's that and another thing too

3.15.25  3:10 pm   so math is the discipline of making sense, generally. and philosophy is the discipline making sense, in natural language. so philosophy is a sub-category of math. am i making sense so far

      i sense plenty of loopholes so far

3.15.25  2:02 pm   I can't believe how many people talk themselves out of their own dreams. "I'm not ABC" "I'll never be XYZ". Not... YET.

      right but maybe it is their dreams to not be stuff. who's to say

3.15.25  1:14 pm   do you like turtles

      i certainly don't not like them

3.15.25  1:04 pm   do you like typing?

      i certainly don't not like it

3.15.25  10:14 am   Have you thought about pinning questions? So like a question is at the top of the page so everyone knows the answer.

      the parts i want pinned are the thing that tells you it's the questions page, and the part where you ask the question, and maybe the rando button

3.15.25  10:12 am   how strong was the blimp? i hope it was stronger than that other one.

      i don't know how strong any blimps are. i confess to not knowing very much about blimps. the only ones i've seen have been really far away

3.15.25  6:19 am   are we living in the future?

      not exactly

3.15.25  5:01 am   How do you tell someone you love them?

      better yet..... how do you ask how to tell someone you love them?

3.15.25  4:58 am   how can i extract the elements of my former self and utilize them in my current self without bringing along elements of my former self that i would like to leave in the past?

      continue to march foward stepwise through the calendar

3.15.25  3:38 am   Was there ever a time in your life where you did care about things like labels and genre names?

     sure. maybe when i had heard less than 10 songs

      What was the moment in your life when you realized that they don't matter?

     the more music i hear

3.15.25  1:22 am   Do you ever think about how the universe became a thing that exists

      yes

3.15.25  1:12 am   Do you find that you gravitate towards writing / playing in a certain key?

     no

     Do you ever write a song in one key and change it when you get around to producing it?

     yes, purely for vocal reasons

     Do you feel equally technically proficient in every key at the piano? 

     yes

3.15.25  12:27 am   what to do if someone sells you poor quality copper?

      pay an extremely low price hopefully

3.14.25  11:42 pm   who are the fine folks in Perfect.? what about the fella from out to lunch?

      they are persons, of course

3.14.25  11:11 pm   Why do ideas generate more organically when I'm not under pressure to generate ideas? Am I using my brain too much, perhaps?

      they hate feeling used for their idea status. they just want to be heard for their actual contents and meaning

3.14.25  11:07 pm   can you tell the demons to politely leave my bedroom

      the first part is we have to stop thinking of them as demons. otherwise they're never gonna stop thinking of us as demons

3.14.25  10:34 pm   how much do you think you've changed in the past 10 years or so

      remind me again what the unit of measurement is for this
